fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sron.diffusion.components

Class DynamicAssembler

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sron.diffusion.components.DynamicAssembler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI

    public class DynamicAssembler
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
    The class DynamicAssembler implements a component doing a dynamic deployment of a small ring overlay network and tries broadcasting and point-to-point message passing over it.

    Description

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2019-04-04

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
